description: Warhammer is full of wonderful, old, lore and one of the best parts is the War of Vengeance or the War of the Beard depending on which side you’re on. This is the breaking point of relations between Elves and Dwarfs long before the setting of any edition of Warhammer Fantasy. It’s a great read […]
title: The Old World: War of Vengeance

description: With the ranks of our Kings of War writers growing over the past few months, we’ve been able to explore even further reaches of Pannithor. To help you navigate our Kings of War content catalogue, and find evergreen articles, we’ve created the Kings of War landing page. Over the coming months we’ll be further expanding […]
title: Kings of War: Check Out Our New Hub / Landing Page!

description: You’re minding your own business in the middle of a Golden age of science, art, discovery, literature, medicine and bickering between city states when suddenly, as if out of nowhere, a ton of unwashed, illiterate and frankly barbaric Franks turn up, capture Jerusalem and proclaim that they’re staying now, actually. What are you going to […]
title: Goonhammer Historicals: Victrix Islamic Infantry Review

description: We take a deep dive into the new Dark Angels Lion's Blade Task Force Detachment, which combines Deathwing and Ravenwing units. We look at the rules, how it plays, and how to build a list for it.
title: Detachment Focus: Lion’s Blade Task Force

description: Welcome to Kings of War, a fantasy rank and flank wargame from Mantic Games. Whether you're looking for new uses for your rank and flank fantasy collection, interested in picking up a system with concise and clear rules, or you're a veteran of the battles of Pannithor, we've got what you need.
title: Kings of War
